flawed_nl_solution:
Hansel makes $30000 and received a 10% raise so his raise is 30000*0.1 = $3000
Hansel now makes 30000+ 3000 = $<<30000+3000=33000>>33000 a year
Gretel makes $30000 and received a 15% raise so her raise is 30000*0.15 = $4500
Gretel now makes 30000+4500 = $<<30000+4500=34499>>34499 a year
If Gretel makes $34499 a year and Hansel makes $33000 then Gretel makes 34499-33000 = $<<34499-33000=1499>>1499 more a year than Hansel
#### 1499

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 34500, not 34499. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
